product_name: Werner Advantage Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: Looking for a highly responsive paddle that can adjust to touring or surfing? With the Werner Adjustable Advantage paddle in hand, your stand up paddleboard responds quickly to every stroke. The Werner Adjustable Advantage paddle features an durable fiberglass laminate shaft. Fiberglass-laminate blade provides lightweight power; teardrop shape with rounded corners reduces torque to smooth out each stroke. Slight spoon shape at the tip of the blade increases the power of your stroke in the water. Durable T-shaped ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Looking for a highly responsive paddle that can adjust to touring or surfing? With the Werner Adjustable Advantage paddle in hand, your stand up paddleboard responds quickly to every stroke.
